name: Mekong Delta Tour (2 Days)
description: I provide a lot of tours in Mekong Delta (Can Tho and 12 other provinces) at the most reasonable price and the best service. Moreover, I have a group of local tour guides who are friendly and their knowledge is even more profound than a tour guild from big agencies. Especially, they just need $2 for their fee, so the price we post just for your services and quality of your tours ^^. Our activities are special and you can't find them via travel books or other travel agencies. You can compare our services and quality with the other travel agencies once you tried.
